summary: The course 'AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate' is designed to provide participants with advanced knowledge and skills in cloud architecture using AWS. The curriculum covers a wide range of topics including introducing cloud architecting, adding storage, compute, and database layers, creating and connecting networking environments, securing user and application access, implementing elasticity, high availability, and monitoring, automating architecture, caching content, building decoupled architectures, microservices, and serverless architectures, planning for disaster recovery, and preparing for AWS certification. The course is hybrid, allowing participants to choose between in-person sessions at Bar-Ilan University campus in Ramat Gan or online via Zoom. It spans 20 sessions over 100 academic hours, with classes held on Tuesdays (17:30-21:30) and Fridays (09:00-13:00). Prerequisites include AWS Practitioner certification or equivalent knowledge. The course aims to prepare participants for advanced certification in the field of cloud computing.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate

COURSE OVERVIEW: This course is designed to prepare participants for the AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate certification. It provides comprehensive training in cloud architecting, focusing on AWS services and solutions. Participants will gain hands-on experience and knowledge to design, deploy, and manage scalable and secure applications on the AWS platform.

TARGET AUDIENCE: This course is intended for individuals seeking advanced certification in cloud computing and AWS solutions.

COURSE LEADERSHIP: Not specified.

PREREQUISITES: Participants must have completed AWS Practitioner training or possess equivalent knowledge.

CERTIFICATIONS: AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate.

COURSE SCHEDULE:
- Start Date: 01.11.2024.
- Duration: 20 sessions.
- Academic Hours: 100 hours.
- Schedule: Tuesdays from 17:30 to 21:30 and Fridays from 09:00 to 13:00.

LEARNING FORMAT:
- Hybrid learning format.
- Classes will be held on-campus at Bar-Ilan University in Ramat Gan and via Zoom, based on participant preference.

TUITION AND FEES: Not specified.

COURSE TOPICS:
- Welcome to AWS Academy Cloud Architecting.
- Introducing Cloud Architecting.
- Adding a Storage Layer.
- Adding a Compute Layer.
- Adding a Database Layer.
- Creating a Networking Environment.
- Connecting Networks.
- Securing User and Application Access.
- Implementing Elasticity, High Availability, and Monitoring.
- Automating Your Architecture.
- Caching Content.
- Building Decoupled Architectures.
- Building Microservices and Serverless Architectures.
- Planning for Disaster.
- Bridging to Certification.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION:
- Contact Number: 052-5886002.
- Email: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION:
- The course is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University.
- The program is part of Bar-Ilan University's dedicated training programs.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION: Participants are invited to join this advanced certification program in the field of cloud computing and AWS solutions.
